name: Jump! Jump! 2 (Beta)
description:
Today the beta version of Jump is available today! Jump! 2. It is available for Windows 10 and MacOs. The beta offers features for new players to delve into the history of the Axolotl:

- An epic story for the axolotl.

- Two levels of story mode.

- A new arcade game mode. (Run and jump!)

- 3 skins and one unlockable.

- Color selection for your flag.
